name: 1970's BASIC Computer Games compiled for Linux
name_original: 1970's BASIC Computer Games compiled for Linux
description:
These are a large collection of games from the classic 1970's book series "BASIC Computer Games".

The .zip file here contains the source code for the games (in BASIC, naturally) along with binaries for modern Linux systems... so you can enjoy computer gaming of the 1970s... right from the comfort of your modern Linux computer.

Includes Hamurabi, Tic Tac Toe, Tower,  Lunar, and many other classics.

If you enjoy this sort of thing, I highly suggest subscribing to The Lunduke Journal:

https://lunduke.substack.com
